entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@himantabiswa @PemaKhanduBJP  Where is your word of appreciation for this man who showed what he can do instead of running from Covid19 try to face the covid and defeat it try to be serious for God sake instead of running from the situation

I congratulate Assam Govt for achieving this
